meanings.definition: The process of making someone or something more sensitive.
meanings.sent1: The sensitization of the skin to sunlight can lead to sunburn.
meanings.sent2: After the sensitization training, the employees were more aware of safety protocols.
meanings.sent3: The sensitization of the alarm clock made waking up a hilarious challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her sensitization to criticism was like having a magnifying glass on her flaws.
meanings.sent5: The sensitization of the taste buds made the spicy food taste even hotter.

meanings.definition: The act of becoming sensitive or responsive to a stimulus.
meanings.sent1: The sensitization of the nerves allowed for quicker reactions to pain.
meanings.sent2: The sensitization of the students to the importance of recycling was successful.
meanings.sent3: The sensitization of the cat to the sound of a can opener was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His sensitization to the beauty of nature was like seeing the world in a new light.
meanings.sent5: The sensitization of the ears to music made every note sound more vibrant.
